description:
Some of the best adventures happen without the help of daylight. Packing up to 425 lumens of light into a low-profile light head, with both spot and flood lighting, BioLite’s Headlamp 425 has plenty of power to light your way. Tipping the scales at a mere 78 grams, this light won’t weigh you down and is easy to bring along. Equipped with a moisture wicking ergonomic head strap, the streamlined design is less likely to bounce about when on the move. USB-C charging does away with annoying “still good” batteries, making it easy to keep your headlamp topped-up and ready to go. And, the intuitive 1-button control make finding the right mode a breeze.

  • 7 different modes, front: spot, flood, spot + flood, flashing, and red light flood, rear: red strobe, red flood
  • Dimmable in all modes, making it easy to find your perfect brightness
  • Reserve mode gives you 1 hour of light to get where you’re going
  • Rear facing red lights help keep you seen
  • Tilt-able light housing lets you aim the light right where you need it
  • 1-button controls are easy to use, with or without gloves
  • Lock-out mode prevents accidental activation, letting you toss your light in you pack with confidence
  • Moisture wicking head strap has a reflective strip to help keep you seen
  • IPX4 water proofing means the light keeps shining even when Mother Nature has other ideas
  • USB-C charging makes it easy to top up your headlamp, going from 0-100% in about 2 hours
  • Pass-through charging lets you power, and charge your light via a connected powerbank
  • 4 level LED fuel indicator lets you know how much power your battery has left
  • In the box: headlamp, USB-C charging cord and documentation
name: BioLite Headlamp 425
